QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Allergen
QAPair.Answer: Common allergens include: Animal proteins and animal dander, Dust, Drugs (such as antibiotics or medicines you put on your skin), Foods (such as egg, peanut, milk, nuts, soy, fish, animal meat, and wheat), Fungal spores, Insect and mite feces, Insect bites and stings (their venom), Natural latex rubber, Pollen ,
